item.title: North Seattle Precinct set to expand Licton Springs footprint
item.description: Where College Way N and Meridian Ave N meet in Licton Springs there is a small police station. That station is responsible for serving all of North Seattle. From Ballard to UDistrict, Fremont to Haller Lake, all of them are served by the North Precinct. This easily makes it the …
item.dc:creator: timothycrosley

item.title: North Seattle Greenway Construction
item.description: A friend of the blog wrote in to let us know the construction of the North Seattle Neighborhood Greenway project down 100th Ave N is set to begin as soon as tomorrow. The project aims to connect Crown Hill, Greenwood, and Licton Springs both to each other and to the …
item.dc:creator: timothycrosley
